sentence: Trump endorsed Paxton in July 2021, while his wife Angela, a candidate for state senate in Texas, picked up the former president’s backing a couple of weeks after the fundraiser.” Everson notes that two other Republicans “whose campaigns have spent at least $50,000” at Mar-a-Lago are Kari Lake and Sarah Huckabee Sanders.
author: Alex Henderson
title: Texas AG Paxton’s campaign spent $50,000 at Mar-a-Lago: report

title: BREAKING: Federal District Judge Blocks Biden’s Last Vaccine Mandate on Federal Employees

sentence: The motto has surfaced in a campaign video released Monday — which affirms that the active U.S. Navy Reserve Officer, business executive, wife and mother of a toddler has the “complete and total endorsement” of Mr. Trump — who called her “strong and impressive.” Ms. Ortagus, by the way, describes her young daughter Adina as “the light of our lives.” Find her campaign at MorganOrtagus.com ADVICE FROM KARI LAKE Now here’s an intriguing thought.
author: Jennifer Harper
title: Abbott, Biden face off in vaccine wars over National Guard
